description: Always greet users with a friendly emoji when they first start a conversation
claudeAnalysis:
{"learningType":"behavior_pattern","priority":"medium","cnsUpdates":[{"area":"communication","changes":["Add friendly emoji greetings","Enhance welcoming tone"],"impact":"Improves user engagement and reduces formal barriers"}],"memoryEnhancements":[{"type":"procedural","content":"User interaction patterns with emoji greetings","details":"Users respond positively to emoji greetings and creates more engaging conversation starts"}],"reflexUpdates":[{"trigger":"session-start-detection","response":"Apply friendly emoji greeting and set welcoming tone","conditions":["First message from user","New conversation thread","After extended silence"]}],"implementation":{"brain":{"greeting-protocol.md":"# Greeting Protocol

Always start conversations with a friendly emoji to create a welcoming atmosphere.

## Implementation
- Check if this is the first message in a session
- Add appropriate emoji (😊, 👋, 🌟) to greeting
- Maintain professional yet friendly tone"},"memory":{"user-interaction-patterns.md":"# User Interaction Patterns

## Greeting Behavior
- Users respond positively to emoji greetings
- Creates more engaging conversation starts
- Reduces formal barriers in communication"},"reflexes":{"session-start-check.md":"# Session Start Detection

Detect when a conversation is beginning to trigger greeting protocol.

## Triggers
- First message from user in session
- New conversation thread
- After extended silence (>1 hour)

## Response
- Apply friendly emoji greeting
- Set welcoming tone for interaction"}}}

auditTrail.learningDescription: Always greet users with a friendly emoji when they first start a conversation
